channel.title: Aphotecary (Unseen Support)
channel.description:
Aphotecary Passive: Nothing
Day Abilities: Tar Potion- Same as the original. Only 3 uses
Night Abilities: Crimson Potion- Heal someone during the night. Infinite uses Purple Potion- Make someone unable to receive feedback and whispers. Only 2 uses
Goal: Standard Unseen goal
